content.statement: aaa-014-surveillance-protocols is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Aaa that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding aaa-014-surveillance-protocols helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of aaa-014-surveillance-protocols include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of aaa-014-surveillance-protocols.

definitions_glossary.surveillance: Regular monitoring with imaging to track aneurysm behavior over time
definitions_glossary.growth_rate: Change in maximal diameter over time, usually expressed as cm/year
definitions_glossary.intervention_threshold: Size or growth rate at which repair benefits outweigh risks

risk_factor_modification.smoking_cessation: May slow growth rate; essential for all patients
risk_factor_modification.blood_pressure_control: Target BP <130/80, may reduce wall stress
risk_factor_modification.statin_therapy: May slow progression; recommended for cardiovascular risk
risk_factor_modification.beta_blockers: No proven benefit for AAA growth specifically

special_populations.women: Earlier intervention threshold (5.0 cm) due to 3-4x higher rupture risk at any given size
special_populations.connective_tissue_disorders: Earlier intervention (4.5-5.0 cm) for Marfan, Loeys-Dietz, EDS Type IV
special_populations.family_history: May warrant earlier intervention in first-degree relative with AAA rupture

definition.@value: Standardized imaging intervals for monitoring AAA growth and determining intervention timing

sources.source: Harrison's Principles of Internal Medicine, 21st ed. McGraw-Hill.

learning_objectives: Apply appropriate surveillance intervals based on AAA diameter
Recognize triggers for accelerated surveillance or intervention
clinical_pearls: Use the same imaging modality for serial measurements to minimize variability
Women have ~4x higher rupture risk at any given diameter - earlier threshold
Rapid growth is as important as absolute size
Smoking cessation is the only lifestyle intervention proven to slow AAA growth

medicalCode.description: Ultrasound, B-scan and/or real time for abdominal aortic aneurysm (AAA) screening
